functions.name: uuid
functions.description: Returns a random UUID according to RFC 4122. utils.uuid()

functions.name: encodestring
functions.description: encodestring returns a base 64 encoded copy of the input string.  utils.encodestring("Hello World")

functions.name: decodestring
functions.description: decodestring returns the string represented by the base 64 encoded input string.  utils.decodestring("SGVsbG8sIFdvcmxk")
